subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Luc Mbah a Moute, a Cameroonian with the Milwaukee Bucks, was back in Africa last week as the first alumnus of an annual N.B.A. camp.
snippet: Luc Mbah a Moute, a Cameroonian with the Milwaukee Bucks, was back in Africa last week as the first alumnus of an annual N.B.A. camp.
